Class Shape2D

java.lang.Object
Shape2D
Direct Known Subclasses:
Circle, Rectangle, Square
public abstract class Shape2D
extends java.lang.Object
An abstract class, Shape2D, is the superclass for 2D shapes that has properties of the shape's center coordinates. Implements calculating area and perimeter of a Shape2D object, checking the distance between two Shape2D objects. Also implements toString and equals methods.
Version:
1.2, 03/03/2021
Author:
Tolga Ozgun
